content: From the Shrine at Rockrest Flat, look off to the left for a path leading to a large opening in the rocks. Just before the path opens up, you can find the final statue head, and claiming its eyes will cause a mantra to be chanted, “Om Mani Padme Hum”, confirming you’ve found the final eye!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rockrest Flat' and the sub-subsection 'The Sixth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
From the Shrine at Rockrest Flat, look off to the left for a path leading to a large opening in the rocks. Just before the path opens up, you can find the final statue head, and claiming its eyes will cause a mantra to be chanted, “Om Mani Padme Hum”, confirming you’ve found the final eye!
